Boku no Hero Academia the Movie -Heroes: Rising-
My Hero Academia: Ascensão dos Heróis
My Hero Academia: El despertar de los Héroes
My Hero Academia: El despertar dels herois
僕のヒーローアカデミア THE MOVIE ヒーローズ：ライジング

U.A. High's Class 1-A have been assigned to Nabu island to help the locals. This has been arranged to keep the students safe from villains. When 4 super-powered villains arrive on the island, Deku and his classmates have to work together like never before. It will require true heroes to save the locals and defeat Nine and his fellows.
